ghost

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Class type that represents relatively static objects in the game. (Wall,Fruit...)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        public Cell(int x,
            int y)
        Parameters:
        x: - x coordinate of the Cell (in unit of Cells)
        y: - y coordinate of the Cell (in unit of Cells)

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app,
                 processing.core.PImage sprite)
        Draw the image of the Cell to the app.
        Parameters:
        app: - the game app.
        sprite: - the PImage of the Cell.

      • getCode

        public char getCode()
        Getter method for the code of the Cell in map.txt
        Returns:
        char code: '0' for Empty cell '1' for horizontal wall '2' for vertical wall '3' for up left corner '4' for up right corner '5' for down left corner '6' for down right corner '7' for Fruit '8' for superFruit 'p' for Waka starting position 'a','c','i','w' for ambusher,chaser,ignorant, whim starting positions. 's' for soda can.

      • getMoveOn

        public boolean getMoveOn()
        The method returns if the cell can be steped upon, fruit, superfruit, soda can can be stepped upon/eaten. The walls can't be.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the cell can be eaten/steped, false otherwise.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)
        Some cells, like fruit, superfruit or soda can will be consumed as Waka going by. Calling update() modifies and updates the cellMap
        Parameters:
        cellMap, - list of list of Cells

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns:
        x coordinate of the Cell in unit of pixel.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Returns:
        y coordinate of the Cell in unit of pixel.
